channel.title: m4 commands?
channel.description: Well today i decided to stop waiting and just get half life along with OP and BS And i was disapointed to see there was no m4 or spas 12 like i saw in the game trailers for them. Does anyone know the console commands if any for the m4 spas 12 or barretta? I would really like to know so i can stop looking at these boring weapons :[

item.title: m4 commands?
item.dc:creator: Brother_Shrike
item.description:
The Minotaur:

Where is twin? I haven’t seen him in a while.

He isn’t listed as a member, so I don’t know…

item.title: m4 commands?
item.dc:creator: popsUlfr
item.description:
HotChiliPepper:

And you can’t use a console command, like in BM, you have to download the High Definition Pack, which will also replace the enemies models for “improved” ones. Read this: https://store.steampowered.com/news/438/

I wouldn’t recommend installing the official HD pack from Steam, you will not be able to play Mods properly with it. There’s A HD pack by “your evil twin” that’s much better in this regard here

The Javid:

Glocks are way better.

Yeah, I don’t like the HD Pack alltogether to be honest. If you want HiDef Half-Life but with the original weapons, I would myself suggest the Half-Life DiamonD Pack. HD Models and better effects, only the new crosshairs and HUD were irritating. But I restored the old ones easely.

Now I’m back to original Half-Life anyway. Nothing can beat that!

Read full topic

item.title: m4 commands?
item.dc:creator: The_Javid
item.description:
a-dot:

Well today i decided to stop waiting and just get half life along with OP and BS And i was disapointed to see there was no m4 or spas 12 like i saw in the game trailers for them. Does anyone know the console commands if any for the m4 spas 12 or barretta? I would really like to know so i can stop looking at these boring weapons :[

I downloaded a pack for higher def models of the original half-life weapons.That shotgun in HL is valves really low def rendering of a spas 12 with out a stock. Barrettas are over rated; I don’t know why the US military uses them. Glocks are way better.

Read full topic

item.title: m4 commands?
item.dc:creator: HotChiliPepper
item.description:
They are not boring, they’re much more satisfying than the HD shit, but the SPAS HQ model just made me cum.
And you can’t use a console command, like in BM, you have to download the High Definition Pack, which will also replace the enemies models for “improved” ones. Read this: https://store.steampowered.com/news/438/
